card.name: Aden Corso
card.property: Failure: You may play a villain ship at no cost.

card.name: Adria
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character for each complication.

card.name: Anubis
card.property: Each of your ships gets firepower +1 for each blockaded mission. Failure: You may pay 2 power. If you do, blockade a mission. (Place the top card of your opponent's mission pile face up beneath this card. Return any blockaded mission it already has.)

card.name: Apophis
card.property: Each time you assign Apophis, you may take a villain ship card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: The Doci
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate a team character for each complication.

card.name: Dutiful Prior
card.property: While this adversary card is in your villain score pile, obstacles that have failure text cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Enlightened Prior
card.property: When you score Enlightened Prior, you may play an adversary at no cost.

card.name: First
card.property: First costs power +1 to play for each assigned character. While First is assigned, each of your Replicator obstacles gets dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one obstacle with dominion.)

card.name: Heru'ur
card.property: While Heru'ur is assigned, the failure text of each villain card occurs an additional time.

card.name: Kali
card.property: Kali costs power -X to play, where X is equal to the experience of the current mission. Failure: Stop a character.

card.name: Kefflin
card.property: While Kefflin is ready, culture missions get difficulty +1.

card.name: Moloc
card.property: When you score Moloc, choose a glyph. Your opponent puts it and all other glyphs the same character has worth the same amount of experience on the bottom of their mission pile in any order.

card.name: Netan
card.property: Each time you pay Netan's revive cost, take each card you would discard into hand instead.

card.name: Odai Ventrell
card.property: Each time your opponent plays a support character, you may stop Odai Ventrell. If you do, stop that support character.

card.name: Quartus
card.property: Quartus' difficulty is equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Robert Kinsey
card.property: Each time you revive Robert Kinsey, you may take a Goa'uld or Political obstacle at the current mission into hand.

card.name: Ronan
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character whose cost is equal to or less than the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Ted
card.property: While Ted is ready, science missions get difficulty +1.

card.name: Tomin
card.property: Tomin gets difficulty +1 for each assigned character who doesn't have a glyph.

card.name: Vengeful Prior
card.property: Ori obstacles cost power -1 to play while Vengeful Prior is assigned. Disease obstacles cost power -1 to play while Vengeful Prior is assigned.

card.name: Adam Banks
card.property: Success: Destroy a villain ship.

card.name: Arlos
card.property: Each time you play a gear, you may stop Arlos. If you do, gain 1 power.

card.name: Birra
card.property: Birra gets culture +1 for each ingenuity obstacle at the current mission. Birra gets ingenuity +1 for each culture obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Brooks
card.property: Brooks costs power -2 to play if there was a successful mission this turn.

card.name: Cameron Mitchell
card.property: Stop Cameron Mitchell, pay 2 power - Ready a hero ship.

card.name: Cicero
card.property: When you play Cicero, you may pay X power. If you do, stop him and destroy an obstacle that costs X.

card.name: "Colonel Danning"
card.property: Each time "Colonel Danning" earns a different glyph, the next mission this turn gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Daniel Jackson
card.property: Success: Destroy all assigned adversaries. During your opponent's turn, Daniel Jackson becomes an Ori adversary with revive cost 5. He can't be scored.

card.name: Devon
card.property: Each time you assign Devon, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: "Dr. Levant"
card.property: At the end of your power phase, gain 1 power for each different glyph "Dr. Levant" has.

card.name: Elizabeth Weir
card.property: Success: Look at one card from the top of your mission pile for each glyph on each assigned character. Place one of those cards on the top of that pile, and the rest on the bottom in any order.

card.name: Emmett Bregman
card.property: Emmett Bregman costs power -1 to play for each assigned character who has a glyph.

card.name: Fannis
card.property: Destroy Fannis - Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Francis Maynard
card.property: Victory: The next mission this turn gets difficulty -1.

card.name: "Grell"
card.property: Scorpius: Complications cost power +1 to play while "Grell" is assigned. Triangulum: Complications cost power +1 to play while "Grell" is assigned.

card.name: Jacek
card.property: Jacek costs power +X to play, where X is equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Jalen
card.property: When you play Jalen, she gets combat +2 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: John Sheppard
card.property: Stop John Sheppard - Each time you play a support character this t urn, that character gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Jonas Quinn
card.property: Jonas Quinn gets skills +1 for each assigned character who has a glyph.

card.name: Lindsey Novak
card.property: Each time one of your ships would be incapacitated, you may stop Lindsey Novak. If you do, stop that ship instead.

card.name: Linea
card.property: culture missions get difficulty +1. During your opponent's turn, Linea becomes an adversary. She can't be revived or scored.

card.name: Ma'chello
card.property: When you play Ma'chello, you may play a gear at no cost.

card.name: "Major Monroe"
card.property: Orion, Stop and incapacitate "Major Monroe" - Destroy all obstacles at the current mission.

card.name: Merlin
card.property: When you play Merlin, he gets skills +2 until the end of the turn. Stop and destroy Merlin, pay 3 power - Choose a team character to get skills +2 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Michael Ryan

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: U.S. Air Force Chief of Staff

card.property: To assign Michael Ryan, pay 4 power and discard a card. While Michael Ryan is assigned, each assigned SGC character gets skills +1.

card.name: Morgan le Fay
card.property: Each time you assign Morgan le Fay, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a hero card, at the end of the current mission, destroy Morgan le Fay.

card.name: Mr. Parker
card.property: Mr. Parker gets science +1 for each NID character who has a glyph.

card.name: Mr. Wayne
card.property: Mr. Parker gets ingenuity +1 for each NID character who has a glyph.

card.name: Pete Shanahan
card.property: Stop Pete Shanahan, pay 4 power - Ready another character, then gain 1 power for each assigned team character who has a glyph.

card.name: Rodney McKay
card.property: Each time you assign Rodney McKay, you may destroy all complications.

card.name: Ryk'l
card.property: Success: You may destroy Ryk'l. If you do, destroy an assigned adversary.

card.name: Se'tak
card.property: Destroy another support character - Se'tak gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission. You can do this only once per turn.

card.name: Sha're
card.property: When you play Sha're, the current mission gets: "Success: Gain 2 power."

card.name: Ta'Seem
card.property: When you play Ta'Seem, you may destroy a stopped adversary.

card.name: Tass'an
card.property: Tass'an gets ingenuity +1 while an adversary is assigned. Tass'an gets ingenuity +1 while assigned with another Jaffa character.

card.name: Thoran
card.property: Success: You may take a hero card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Bo'rel
card.property: Each other Jaffa character who has at least one glyph matching one of Bo'rel's gets skills +1.

card.name: Bra'tac
card.property: Each time Bra'tac earns a different glyph, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready or stop another Jaffa card.

card.name: Cameron Mitchell
card.property: Each time you assign Cameron Mitchell, you may look at two cards from the top of your opponent's deck for each different glyph he has. Place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

card.name: Chekov
card.property: Each time Chekov earns a Libra or Triangulum glyph, you may search your deck for a hero ship card. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Daniel Jackson
card.property: Orion and Orion: Support characters cost power -1 to play. Pisces and Pisces: Support characters cost power -1 to play. Triangulum and Triangulum: Support characters cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Dave Dixon
card.property: To assign an adversary while Dave Dixon is assigned, your opponent pays 1 power for each Libra glyph he has.

card.name: Erin Gant
card.property: Victory: Gain 1 power for each different glyph Erin Gant has.

card.name: Hadden
card.property: Hadden gets ingenuity +1 for each different glyph he has.

card.name: Harold Maybourne
card.property: Gemini, Stop Harold Maybourne - All other Russian team characters and NID team characters get skills +1 until the end of the current mission. Orion: Each other Russian or NID character who has a Orion glyph gets skills +1.

card.name: Hoskins
card.property: Gemini or Orion, Destroy a support character - Destroy an obstacle at the current mission that costs less than that character. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Libra or Orion: Each assigned team character gets combat +1 while Jack O'Neill is assigned. Gemini and Orion: Each assigned team character gets ingenuity +1 while Jack O'Neill is assigned.

card.name: Jacob Cater
card.property: Pisces: Jacob Carter gets culture +1 and combat +1. Triangulum: Jacob Carter gets science +1 and ingenuity +1. Pisces and Triangulum: Jacob Carter gets science +1 and combat +1.

card.name: Jonas Quinn
card.property: Each time you assign Jonas Quinn, you may pay 2 power. If you do, destroy an obstacle with a cost equal to or less than the number of glyphs he has.

card.name: Lionel Pendergast
card.property: Scorpius, Stop a hero ship - Destroy an obstacle at the current mission whose cost is equal to or less than that ship's firepower. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Loki
card.property: Pisces, Stop a support character - Choose an obstacle at the current mission that costs less than that character. Turn that obstacle face down (it becomes a complication). You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Malek
card.property: Orion: Tok'ra support characters cost you power -1 to play. Pisces: Tok'ra event, Tok'ra gear, and Tok'ra ships cost you power -1 to play.

card.name: Marks
card.property: Triangulum: Marks gets skills +1 while a hero ship is assigned.

card.name: Neath
card.property: Scorpius: Neath gets skills +1 while another Jaffa team character is assigned. Triangulum: Neath gets skills +1 while a Jaffa support character is assigned.

card.name: Paul Emerson
card.property: Gemini: Ships cost you power -1 to play. Scorpius: Ships cost you power -1 to play.

card.name: Samantha Carter
card.property: Libra and Libra: Obstacles cost power +1 to play. Orion and Orion: Obstacles cost power +1 to play. Pisces and Pisces: Obstacles cost power +1 to play.

card.name: Sergei Evanov
card.property: Each time Sergei Evanov earns a different glyph, you may search your deck for a Russian card. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Simon Coombs
card.property: Each time Simon Coombs earns a glyph, place a promotion token on a team character. (That character gets point value +1 for each such token, to a maximum point value of 6.)

card.name: Teal'c
card.property: Pisces and Pisces: Each time you play a culture mission, you may ready Teal'c. Triangulum and Triangulum: Each time you play a combat mission, you may ready Teal'c. Gemini and Gemini: Each time you play a ingenuity mission, you may ready Teal'c.

card.name: Thor
card.property: Pisces or Triangulum: Each assigned team character gets culture +1 while Thor is assigned. Pisces and Scorpius: Each assigned team character gets science +1 while Thor is assigned.

card.name: Vala Mal Doran
card.property: Each time Vala Mal Doran earns a glyph, your opponent discards a random card. You gain power equal to its cost.

card.name: Vala Mal Doran
card.property: Each other SGC team character gets skills +1 while Vala Mal Doran is assigned to a mission that has a glyph matching one of hers.

card.name: Weaver
card.property: At the start of your debrief phase, you may discard up to one card for each different glyph Weaver has.

card.name: William Ronson
card.property: While a hero ship is assigned, each other character who has at least one glyph matching one of William Ronson's gets skills +1.

card.name: Cheap Knockoff
card.property: To play this event, pay power equal to double the cost of an obstacle. Destroy that obstacle.

card.name: Conservation
card.property: This event costs power -1 to play for each Tok'ra character who has a glyph. Take a hero card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Covert Strike
card.property: To play this event, stop any number of team characters. Destroy an obstacle with a cost equal to that number of characters.

card.name: Fend Off
card.property: Choose one: stop a villain ship; or destroy a stopped villain ship.

card.name: Harsh Justice
card.property: This event costs power -1 to play for each Jaffa character who has a glyph. Destroy an adversary.

card.name: Indulgences
card.property: Discard any number of cards from your hand, then draw a card.

card.name: Insight
card.property: Place a promotion token on a team character. (They get point value +1 for each such token, to a maximum point value of 6.) They get skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Interference
card.property: To play this event, stop and destroy an Ancient support character. Destroy an adversary who costs less than that character.

card.name: Nice Enough Couple
card.property: Choose a character. They and each other character who has at least one glyph matching one of theirs get skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Part of the Plan
card.property: Ready an assigned adversary. They are blocked from the current mission.

card.name: Proactive Stance
card.property: This event costs power -1 to play for each NID character who has a glyph. Ready a gear.

card.name: Proceeding with Caution
card.property: This event costs power -1 to play for each Russian character who has a glyph. Each character gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission for each glyph they have.

card.name: Protector of All
card.property: This event costs power -1 to play for each Asgard character who has a glyph. Destroy an obstacle.

card.name: Revisionist History
card.property: To play this event, stop an assigned character. Choose up to four non-event cards in a player's discard pile. That player shuffles them into their deck.

card.name: Scramble
card.property: Ready a hero ship.

card.name: Temptation
card.property: Stop an adversary. Your opponent may stop a character.

card.name: Anti-Replicator Disruptor
card.property: Stop this gear - Reveal a random card from an opponent's hand. If it's a Replicator card, they discard it. Destroy this gear, pay 2 power - Destroy a replicator obstacle or assigned Replicator adversary.

card.name: HUD Headset
card.property: While a Tok'ra character is assigned, you get total firepower +1 in each ship battle. While a Jaffa character is assigned, you get total firepower +1 in each ship battle.

card.name: Mind Transference Device
card.property: Stop this gear, stop a team character, pay 2 power - Ready another character.

card.name: Quantum Mirror Control
card.property: Pay 3 power, stop this gear - Search your deck for a character card and reveal it. Then shuffle the rest of your deck and place that card on top of it.

card.name: Quarantine Container
card.property: Stop this gear - Choose an obstacle. When it would be destroyed, place it face up beneath this gear instead. Your opponent discards any other card beneath this gear. Your opponent can't play an obstacle that has the same title as a card beneath this gear.

card.name: Russian-Controlled DHD
card.property: Stop this gear, stop a Russian team character or two Russian support characters - Search your mission pile for a mission, shuffle the rest of the pile, then place that mission on top of it.

card.name: Terra-Root
card.property: Destroy this gear - Gain 1 power.

card.name: U.A.V.
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 1 power - Reveal a random card from your opponent's hand. If it's a villain card, the current mission gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Accompany Documentary Crew
card.property: Each assigned team character who has a glyph gets culture +1.

card.name: Aid Evacuation
card.property: Each obstacle costs power -1 to play for each trait (other than obstacle) it shares with a villain card at the current mission.

card.name: Aid Resistance
card.property: This mission gets difficulty -1 for each successful mission this turn.

card.name: Appropriations Committee Meeting
card.property: Success: Gain 1 power for each character who has a glyph.

card.name: Attend Jaffa Summit
card.property: Adversaries are blocked while all assigned characters are team characters.

card.name: Calibrate Super-Weapon
card.property: If there have been no successful mission this turn, this mission gets difficulty +2.

card.name: Capture Clone
card.property: When you play this mission, you may pay 3 power. If you do, choose an adversary. They are blocked.

card.name: Cloak Earth
card.property: This mission gets difficulty -1 while at least one character who has a Libra glyph is assigned.

card.name: Consult Expert
card.property: Failure: Your opponent stops a character.

card.name: Coordinated Assault
card.property: Success: Look at the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck. You may place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

card.name: Cure Deadly Virus
card.property: Success: You may ready an assigned character.

card.name: Destroy Kassa Shipment
card.property: Success: Destroy a villain ship.

card.name: Destroy Weapon
card.property: Success: Each team character gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Diplomatic Envoy
card.property: When you play this mission, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready a support character.

card.name: Disable Orbital Weapon
card.property: Success: Your opponent may pay power equal to an adversary's cost. If they do, they score that adversary.

card.name: Discredit Leak
card.property: Failure: Obstacles cost power -1 to play until the end of turn.

card.name: Eradicate Computer Virus
card.property: Failure: You can't play any more missions this turn.

card.name: Escape the Pressure
card.property: To assign a character, pay 1 power for each glyph they have.

card.name: Escape Time Dilation Field
card.property: Failure: Your opponent may place this mission on top of your mission pile.

card.name: Escort IOA Representatives
card.property: Each time your opponent plays a complication, stop a character.

card.name: Exonerate Team Member
card.property: This mission gets difficulty -1 while an assigned character has at least 2 glyphs.

card.name: Explore Ruins
card.property: Success: Choose up to four cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck.

card.name: Extract Prisoners
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Free Unas
card.property: When you play this mission, your opponent chooses a support character. They are stopped. Failure: Destroy the chosen character.

card.name: Halt Subterranean Reaction
card.property: When you play this mission, you may discard any number of cards. For every four you discard, this mission gets difficulty -1.

card.name: Hide the Harcesis
card.property: Failure: Your opponent may search their deck for a villain card. If they do, they reveal it, takes it into hand, and shuffles their deck.

card.name: Infiltrate Lucian Alliance
card.property: When you play this mission, if there have been no successful missions this turn, your opponent gains 2 power.

card.name: Investigate Farrow-Marshall
card.property: Obstacles that share a trait with an assigned adversary cost power -1 to play.

card.name: Investigate the Aschen
card.property: When you play this mission, your opponent may stop an adversary. If they do, they gain power equal to that adversary's culture.

card.name: Liberate Labor Camp
card.property: Support characters are blocked while an adversary is assigned.

card.name: Lie Low
card.property: This mission gets difficulty -1 while two or fewer characters are assigned.

card.name: Locate the Eye of Ra
card.property: Failure: Your opponent incapacitates a team character.

card.name: Negotiate Mining Rights
card.property: This mission gets difficulty +2 while there are more assigned support characters than assigned team characters.

card.name: Obtain Information
card.property: Failure: Your opponent may look at the top card of your mission pile, then place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Protect Village
card.property: Failure: Your opponent may search their deck for an obstacle card. If they do, they reveal it, takes it into hand, and shuffles their deck.

card.name: Recover Team Member
card.property: When you play this mission, choose a team character. They are blocked. Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Recover Touchstone
card.property: Success: You may look at the top four cards of your deck. You may place them in any order on the top and/or bottom of that deck.

card.name: Repair Engines
card.property: Success: Ready a hero ship.

card.name: Repel Moloc
card.property: Success: Assigned adversaries can't be revived.

card.name: Restore Timeline
card.property: Success: You may take a hero card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Retain Custody
card.property: This mission gets difficulty +1 for each ready adversary.

card.name: Reverse Space/Time Rupture
card.property: Success: Ready all assigned support characters.

card.name: Review Hollywood Script
card.property: Each time an adversary or character would be destroyed by an opponent's card, stop them instead.

card.name: Sabotage Ship Construction
card.property: Failure: Your opponent may search their deck for a villain ship card. If they do, they reveal it, takes it into hand, and shuffles their deck.

card.name: Salvage Enemy Ship
card.property: Success: You may search your deck for a hero ship card. If you do, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Secure Crash Site
card.property: Each time you assign a character, your opponent gains power equal to the number of glyphs they have.

card.name: Trade Rendezvous
card.property: Success: You may play a gear at no cost.

card.name: Withstand Armada
card.property: This mission gets difficulty -1 while a hero ship is assigned.

card.name: Adaptation
card.property: Failure: For each other Replicator card at the current mission, destroy a gear.

card.name: Alliance in Jeopardy
card.property: Failure: Stop a number of characters equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Ambushed Summit
card.property: Failure: Destroy any number of support characters whose total cost is equal to or less than the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Barroom Thugs
card.property: This obstacle costs power -X to play, where X is equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Battered Defenses
card.property: When you play this obstacle, stop a support character for each card in your villain score pile.

card.name: Clues from the Past
card.property: Failure: The next mission this turn gets difficulty +1.

card.name: Cornered
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent stops a character for each other Replicator card at the current mission.

card.name: Corrupted Ally
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character. Then, if your opponent has more support characters than team characters, destroy another support character.

card.name: Debilitated
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a team character. They are blocked, and their owner may perform this action: "Pay power equal to the experience of the current mission - Destroy this obstacle."

card.name: Direct Hit
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may choose one: stop a hero ship; or destroy a stopped hero ship.

card.name: Execution Squad
card.property: Failure: You may pay 2 power. If you do, destroy a support character.

card.name: Exploitation
card.property: Success or Failure: You may force the hero player to continue to another mission this turn. If you do, they pay no power to continue, though you still gain 1 power for each failed mission.

card.name: Final Challenge
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent may stop a team character. If they don't, you may destroy a support character.

card.name: Friends at Odds
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned team character. Team characters who don't have all of their traits are blocked.

card.name: The Game of Diplomacy
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a glyph. Stop each character who has that glyph.

card.name: Genetic Manipulations
card.property: Failure: Your opponent incapacitates a team character for each card in your villain score pile.

card.name: Goa'uld Probe
card.property: Failure: The next mission this turn gets difficulty +1.

card.name: Government Oversight
card.property: This obstacle costs power -X to play, where X is equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Greed Exploited
card.property: This obstacle's difficulty is equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Hathor's Interogation
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may take a villain card from your discard pile and place it on top of your deck.

card.name: Hok'taur Experiments
card.property: Failure: Destroy a support character for each card in your villain score pile.

card.name: A Matter of Trust
card.property: Failure: Stop a character.

card.name: Might of the Orici
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may pay power equal to the experience of the current mission. If you do, destroy an assigned support character.

card.name: Mutated Creature
card.property: When you play this obstacle, for each stopped character who has a glyph, your opponent destroys a support character.

card.name: Nerve Gas Attack
card.property: This obstacle costs power -X to play, where X is equal to the experience of the current mission. Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Nothing But Weakness
card.property: Failure: Incapacitate a team character. Then, if a Goa'uld adversary is assigned, you may take this obstacle into your hand.

card.name: Orbital Bombardment
card.property: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each assigned villain ship.

card.name: Ori Ground Forces
card.property: Failure: Gain power equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Ori Satellite Attack
card.property: Failure: Destroy a hero ship.

card.name: Prelude to Invasion
card.property: When you play this obstacle, for each stopped character who has a glyph, your opponent stop a character.

card.name: Prior Bugs
card.property: To assign a support character, your opponent destroys a support character.

card.name: Prior Engagement
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may pay power equal to the experience of the current mission. If you do, stop a character.

card.name: Probing the Subconscious
card.property: This obstacle costs power -X to play, where X is equal to the experience of the current mission. Each character who has a glyph matching the current mission is blocked.

card.name: Reanimated Dead
card.property: This obstacle costs power -X to play, where X is equal to the experience of the current mission. Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Relentless Pursuit
card.property: When you play this obstacle, ready a villain ship.

card.name: Replicator Ruse
card.property: Failure: Look at one card from the top of your opponent's mission pile for each other Replicator card at the current mission. Place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Rerouted
card.property: Failure: Look at a number of cards from the top of your opponent's mission pile equal to the experience of the current mission. Place those cards on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Senseless Slaughter
card.property: Failure: You may pay any amount of power. Your opponent destroys that many support characters.

card.name: Set Up
card.property: Each time your opponent assigns a character who has no glyph, you gain 1 power.

card.name: Spies Everywhere
card.property: This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each card in your villain score pile.

card.name: Super Pheromones
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character. They are blocked.

card.name: Teachings of Origin
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may discard an Ori card. If you do, gain power equal to its cost.

card.name: Technology Interface
card.property: This obstacle's difficulty is equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Teeming Numbers
card.property: When you play this obstacle, destroy an assigned hero ship whose cost is equal to or less than the number of other Replicator cards at the current mission.

card.name: Threat of Force
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each card in your villain score pile.

card.name: Too Easy
card.property: Failure: Your opponent stops a number of characters equal to the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Transdimensional Bridge
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may choose to have your opponent shuffle their mission pile.

card.name: Trial By Fire
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent chooses an assigned team character. Failure: Incapacitate the chosen character.

card.name: Ultimatum
card.property: Failure: You may pay 2 power. If you do, incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Archaic Death Glider
card.property: Each time you assign this ship, you may pay 3 power. If you do, block an adversary from the current mission.

card.name: The Daniel Jackson
card.property: Each time you assign the Daniel Jackson, you may pay 3 power. If you do, take a hero card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: F-302
card.property: Each time you assign this ship, you may pay 3 power. If you do, turn a combat obstacle at the current mission face down (it becomes a complication).

card.name: Free Jaffa Ha'tak
card.property: This ship gets firepower +1 for each assigned Jaffa character who has a glyph./nVictory: You may pay 2 power. If you do, search your deck for a Jaffa hero card, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Jacek's Tel'tak
card.property: Success: Discard any number of cards, then draw the same number of cards.

card.name: Korolev
card.property: Korolev gets firepower +1 for each failed mission this turn. Each time you assign Korolev, ready a Russian character or a character who has a glyph.

card.name: The O'Neill
card.property: Each time you assign the O'Neill, you may destroy it. If you do, destroy a Replicator obstacle at the current mission. Victory: You may pay X power. If you do, destroy an obstacle that costs X.

card.name: Odyssey
card.property: Victory: You may pay 1 power. If you do, each assigned character who has a glyph gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Prometheus
card.property: Each time you assign Prometheus, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready a character who has a promotion token. Victory: Place a promotion token on a team character. (That character gets point value +1 for each such token, to a maximum point value of 6.)

card.name: Seberus
card.property: Each time you assign Seberus, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready a support character.

card.name: Selmak's Tel'tak
card.property: While Selmak's Tel'tak is assigned, each character who has a promotion token gets skills +1. Success: Place a promotion token on a team character. (That character gets point value +1 for each such token, to a maximum point value of 6.)

card.name: Tok'ra Tel'tak
card.property: Success: Look at the top card of your mission pile. Place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Trust-Controlled Al'kesh
card.property: Victory: You may pay 4 power. If you do, destroy an assigned adversary.

card.name: Adria's Mothership
card.property: Victory: You may pay 3 power. If you do, blockade a mission. (Place the top card of your opponent's mission pile face up beneath this card. Return any blockaded mission it already has.)/nFailure: Destroy a support character for each blockaded mission.

card.name: Al'kesh Bomber
card.property: Each time you assign this ship, you may choose a glyph on an assigned character and pay power equal to its experience. If you do, your opponent may choose to pay the same amount of power. If they don't, they put that glyph on the bottom of their mission pile.

card.name: Anubis' Mothership
card.property: Each time you assign Anubis' Mothership, you may pay 1 power. If you do, search your deck for a Goa'uld card, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Apophis' Ha'tak
card.property: Apophis' Ha'tak gets firepower +X, where X is equal to the experience of the current mission. Victory: Your opponent may stop two characters. If they don't, you may stop a character.

card.name: Archaic Tel'tak
card.property: Each time you assign this ship, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready or unblock an adversary.

card.name: Aschen Harvester
card.property: Victory: Gain 1 power for each blockaded mission. Failure: You may pay 2 power. If you do, blockade a mission. (Place the top card of your opponent's mission pile face up beneath this card. Return any blockaded mission it already has.)

card.name: Baal's Ha'tak
card.property: Victory: You may pay 3 power. If you do, blockade a mission. (Place the top card of your opponent's mission pile face up beneath this card. Return any blockaded mission it already has.) Failure: Stop a character for each blockaded mission.

card.name: Death Glider
card.property: Victory: You may pay X power. If you do, destroy an assigned support character that costs X.

card.name: Gadmeer Ship
card.property: Failure: Look at the top card of your opponent's mission pile. Place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Goa'uld Ha'tak
card.property: Each Goa'uld card in your villain score pile gets cost +1. Failure: Destroy a stopped hero ship.

card.name: Lucian Alliance Freighter
card.property: Each time you assign this ship, you may choose one: pay X power and place X cards from your hand face down beneath this ship; or gain 1 power for each card beneath this ship and then place those cards in your discard pile.

card.name: Ori Fighter
card.property: Failure: You may pay 2 power. If you do, blockade a mission. (Place the top card of your opponent's mission pile face up beneath this card. Return any blockaded mission it already has.)

card.name: Ori Mothership
card.property: Each time you assign this ship, you may pay 2 power. If you do, reveal your hand and gain 1 power for each Ori card in it. Victory: The current mission gets difficulty +1.

card.name: Ra's Mothership
card.property: Each time you assign Ra's Mothership, you may pay 3 power. If you do, place an assigned support character face down beneath it. Victory: The current mission gets difficulty +1 for each card beneath Ra's Mothership.

card.name: Replicator Lander
card.property: Replicator Lander gets firepower +1 for each other Replicator card at the current mission. Each time you assign Replicator Lander, you may pay X power. If you do, take a Replicator card that costs X from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Replicator Mothership
card.property: While Replicator Mothership is assigned, each Replicator adversary gets difficulty +1. Victory: You may pay 1 power. If you do, each Replicator obstacle at the current mission gets difficulty +1.

card.name: Adria
card.property: Each time you assign Adria, ready an assigned character. They are blocked from the current mission.

card.name: Dr. Jackson
card.property: Each time you assign Dr. Jackson, gain 1 power for each glyph on the assigned character who has the most glyphs. When you score Dr. Jackson, incapacitate an SGC team character.

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Gemini and Gemini: Missions get difficulty -1. Triangulum and Triangulum: Missions get difficulty -1.

card.name: Jonas Quinn
card.property: Each time you assign Jonas Quinn, reveal one card from the top of your deck for each different glyph he has. He gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission for each villain card revealed. Place the cards you revealed in any order on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Beliskner
card.property: Victory: Place a promotion token on a team character. (That character gets point value +1 for each such token, to a maximum point value of 6.) Success: If a character who has a promotion token is assigned, you may destroy an adversary.

card.name: Apophis' Mothership
card.property: While Apophis' Mothership is assigned, Goa'uld obstacles and Jaffa obstacles get difficulty +1.
